description: Chrome automation: Navigate to Blackboard using keyboard shortcuts and basic navigation

actions.description: Open Blackboard in Chrome browser
Wait for Chrome to load
Use Ctrl+L to focus the address bar (more reliable than UIA detection)
Wait for address bar to be focused
Type the Blackboard URL in the address bar
Wait for URL to be entered
Press Enter to navigate to Blackboard
Wait for Blackboard to load and redirect to Microsoft login

actions.name: username
actions.description: Set a test username (you can modify this)
Type the username in the login form
Wait for username to be entered
Press Enter to proceed to password field
Wait for password field to appear

actions.name: password
actions.description: Set a test password (you can modify this)
Type the password in the login form
Wait for password to be entered
Press Enter to sign in
Wait for authentication and redirect to Blackboard

actions.name: success_message
actions.value: Successfully navigated to Blackboard! (Note: Login may have failed with test credentials)
actions.description: Set success message
Show success message and keep browser open
